amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the DOD to complete a cost competitiveness calculation ensuring that the Department does not purchase alternative fuels unless they are as cost effective as traditional fuels. Also, research on alternative fuels would be allowed to continue.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-217 to require the DOD to complete a cost competitiveness calculation ensuring that the Department does not purchase alternative fuels unless they are as cost effective as traditional fuels. Also, research on alternative fuels is allowed to continue.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 218 (Roll no. 367).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 218 (Roll no. 367).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Buck.
